WaveSoundBuffer.fade

Function/Meaning
Starts fading
Type
Method of the WaveSoundBuffer class
Syntax
fade(to, time, delay=0)
Arguments
to Specifies the target volume.
Refer to the WaveSoundBuffer.volume property for details on volume specification.
time Specifies the time for the fade in ms.
delay Specifies the delay before the fade starts in ms.
Return Value
None (void)
Description
Starts a fade (a continuous change in volume).
